``brokkr``
==========
.. automodule:: brokkr

Global Variables
----------------
.. attribute:: DEFAULT_USYS

   Master unit system.

.. attribute:: UREG

   Master unit resgistry.

Additional Namespace Objects
----------------------------
In addition to the variables/objects/etc. listed above, the following entities
are avaialble from the top level ``brokkr`` namespace.

* list of stuff
